lines.content: > "Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.‚Äù
PeppaTaskHandler makes it much easier to plan and manage your tasks on a daily basis. It's
1. download java if you have yet to install!
4. tell peppa your tasks and notes
5. Enjoy as Peppa oinks away and managed all your tasks and notes for you ü§©
## *Features that Peppa has to offer you* üê∑
* Adds a **Todo** in your list of tasks
* Adds a **Deadline** in your list of tasks
* Adds an **Event** in your list of tasks
* **List** all the tasks that you have added to Peppa
* **Deletes** a particular task for you if you no longer need it
* Indicated a task as **done** if you have completed it
###7. Feature Find a task by a keyword
* Helps you **find** a task by typing a keyword
* Allows you to **add a Note** to remind yourself of details
* **Lists all the notes** that you have added to Peppa
* **Say bye** to *Peppa* before you close the application!
*This action adds a Todo to the list of tasks and Peppa will respond with the todo that has been added and the total number of tasks in the list.*
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 2 tasks in the list.
*This action adds a Deadline to the list of tasks and Peppa will respond with the deadline that has been added and the total number of tasks in the list.*
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 3 tasks in the list.
*This action adds an Event to the list of tasks and Peppa will respond with the event that has been added and the total number of tasks in the list.*
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 4 tasks in the list.
*This action lists all the tasks in the order that you have told Peppa. It will also indicate the type of each task and whether the task has been done.*
Here are the tasks in your list:
*This action requires a task number and deletes the task that corresponds to that number.
Peppa will respond with the task that has been deleted and the total number of tasks left in the list.*
Now you have 3 tasks in the list.
*This action requires a task number and indicates the task that corresponds to that number as done.
Peppa will respond with the task that has been indicated as done.*
Nice! I've marked this task as done:
*This action requires a keyword and Peppa will respond with the tasks that match with the keyword.
The aim is to allow users to find their tasks more easily especially when the list gets longer üòÖ*
Here are the matching tasks in your list:
*This action adds a note and Peppa responds with the note that you have added and the total number of notes.*
Got it. I've added this note:
Now you have 2 tasks in the list.
*This action asks Peppa to list all the notes stored in the order that they were added and states the total number of notes.*
Got it. I've added this note:
Now you have 2 notes in the list.
Bye. Hope to see you again soon!

> "Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.‚Äù
PeppaTaskHandler makes it much easier to plan and manage your tasks on a daily basis. It's
1. download java if you have yet to install!
4. tell peppa your tasks and notes
5. Enjoy as Peppa oinks away and managed all your tasks and notes for you ü§©
## *Features that Peppa has to offer you* üê∑
* Adds a **Todo** in your list of tasks
* Adds a **Deadline** in your list of tasks
* Adds an **Event** in your list of tasks
* **List** all the tasks that you have added to Peppa
* **Deletes** a particular task for you if you no longer need it
* Indicated a task as **done** if you have completed it
###7. Feature Find a task by a keyword

* Prints out the relevant messages and responds to user's inputs on the user interface
* Prints out the error that has occurred.
* @return String message when error has occurred.
* Prints out the welcome message and asks the user to input his/her command.
* @return Welcome message to guide users what to do.
String instructions = "Here's a manual: \n1. To add a task play: todo play " +
"\n2. To add a deadline: deadline return book /by 02/12/2021 18:00, " +
"\n3. To add an event: event meet friend /at 02/12/2021 18:00 - 19:00" +
"\n4. To indicate task as done: done 2, where 2 refers to the task number" +
"\n5. To delete task: delete 3, where 3 refers to the task number" +
"\n6. To list tasks: list" + "\n7. to find a task using keyword: find play" +
"\n8. To add a note: note my password is 123" + "\n9. To list the notes: List of Notes" +
* Prints out a horizontal dashed line on the user interface.

String responseToList = "Here are the tasks in your list:";
* Prints the tasks that has been completed by the user.
* @param tasks Collection of tasks in the task manager application.

public String respondToDone(ArrayList<Task> tasks, Integer taskNumber) {
String responseToDone = "\tNice! I've marked this task as done: \n \t \t" + " ["
* Prints the task that has been deleted by the user.
* @param tasks Collection of tasks in the task manager application.
* @param task task that has been completed in the list of tasks.
* @return String message when user wants to delete a task.
public String respondToDelete(ArrayList<Task> tasks, Task task) {
String responseToDelete = "\tNoted. I've removed this task: \n\t\t" + task.toString() +
"\n\tNow you have " + Integer.toString(tasks.size()) + " tasks in the list.";
* Prints the Todo task that has been created by the user.

* Prints the Event task that has been created by the user.

* Prints the response on the user interface to the bye input by user.

* Exception that is thrown when a Deadline class cannot be created due to empty description provided by user.
* Creates an object of the DeadlineException class.
* Gets the message to be printed in response to the error.
* @return String message in response to the error thrown.
return "\tOOPS!!! The description of a deadline cannot be empty.";
* Exception that is thrown when there are errors encountered in the Duke application.
* Creates an object of the DukeException object
* Gets the message to be printed in response to the DukeException error.
* @return String message in response to the error thrown.
* Exception that is thrown when an Event class cannot be created due to empty description provided by user.
* Creates an object of the EventException class.
* Gets the message to be printed in response to the error.
* @return String message in response to the error thrown.
return "\tOOPS!!! The description of a event cannot be empty.";
* Exception that is thrown when a Todo class cannot be created due to empty description provided by user.
* Creates an object of the TodoException class.
* Gets the message to be printed in response to the error.
* @return String message in response to the error thrown.
return "\tOOPS!!! The description of a todo cannot be empty.";
* Represent the task of type Deadline.
* @param description Description of what the Deadline task is about.
* @param by Deadline by which the task should be completed.
* @throws DeadlineException If the Deadline object cannot be created successfully due to empty description.
public Deadline(String description, String by) throws DeadlineException {
* Gets the information of the task such as its description and deadline to store in the hard disk.
* Gets the type of the task and denotes it with a letter to store in the hard disk.
* @return The letter that indicates the type of the task.
* Gets the date that the task must be completed by.
* @return String denoting the deadline of the task.
* Gets the time by which the task must be completed.
* @return String denoting the time by which task must be completed.
* Stores the task in the hard disk.
* @return String denoting the Deadline task which will be stored in the hard disk.
* Returns the String representation of the task.
* @return String representation of the deadline task created.
* Represent the task of type Event.
* @param description Description of what the Event task is about.
* @throws EventException If the Event object cannot be created successfully due to empty description.
public Event(String description, String at) throws EventException {
* Gets the information of the task such as its description and deadline to store in the hard disk.
* Gets the type of the task and denotes it with a letter to store in the hard disk.
* @return The letter that indicates the type of the task.
* Gets the date of the event.
* @return String denoting the date of the event.
* Gets the start time of the event.
* @return String denoting the end time of the event.
* Gets the end time of the event.
* @return String denoting the end time of the event.
* Stores the task in the hard disk.
* @return String denoting the Event task which will be stored in the hard disk.
* Returns the String representation of the task.
* @return String representation of the event task created.
return "[E]" + super.toString() + "(at: " + getDate() + " from " + getStartTime() + " to " + getEndTime() + ")";
* @param description Description of what the task is about.
* Gets the description of the task.
* @return String that describes what the task is about.
* Gets the information of the task such as its description to store in the hard disk.
* Gets the type of the task and denotes it with a letter to store in the hard disk.
* @return The letter that indicates the type of the task.
* Gets the string indicating whether the task has been completed or not to be stored in hard disk.
* @return String indicating whether task has been completed.
* Gets the icon indicating whether task has been completed to be printed to the user interface.
* @return Icon indicating whether task has been completed.
return (isDone ? "X" : " "); // mark done task with X
* Mark the particular task as done.
* Stores the task in the hard disk.
* @return String denoting the Task which will be stored in the hard disk.
* Returns the String representation of the task.
* @return String representation of the task created.

* @throws TodoException If the Todo object cannot be created successfully due to empty description.
* Gets the information of the task such as its description and deadline to store in the hard disk.
* Gets the type of the task and denotes it with a letter to store in the hard disk.
* @return The letter that indicates the type of the task.
* Stores the task in the hard disk.
* @return String denoting the Todo task which will be stored in the hard disk.
* Returns the String representation of the task.
* @return String representation of the todo task created.
